name: dfac12
body: |- wb(wac, wral(s0, con0, wcel(cpw(cfv(cale, cv(s0))), cdm(ccrd))))

stmt.origin: bitri(wac, wral(s0, con0, wcel(cpw(cfv(cale, cv(s0))), cdm(ccrd))), wral(hs0, con0, wcel(cpw(cv(hs0)), cdm(ccrd))))
stmt.pretty: bitri(wac, ∀(s0 ∈ On, P((aleph ` s0))∈ dom(card)), ∀(hs0 ∈ On, P(hs0)∈ dom(card)))

body.origin:
|- wb(wac, wral(s0, con0, wcel(cpw(cfv(cale, cv(s0))), cdm(ccrd))))
-| wb(wac, wral(hs0, con0, wcel(cpw(cv(hs0)), cdm(ccrd))))
-| wb(wral(hs0, con0, wcel(cpw(cv(hs0)), cdm(ccrd))), wral(s0, con0, wcel(cpw(cfv(cale, cv(s0))), cdm(ccrd))))
body.pretty:
⊢ (CHOICE ↔ ∀(s0 ∈ On, P((aleph ` s0))∈ dom(card)))
⊣ (CHOICE ↔ ∀(hs0 ∈ On, P(hs0)∈ dom(card)))
⊣ (∀(hs0 ∈ On, P(hs0)∈ dom(card))↔ ∀(s0 ∈ On, P((aleph ` s0))∈ dom(card)))

comment: The axiom of choice holds iff every aleph has a well-orderable powerset. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 21-May-2015.)
